projects.title: Furever
projects.description: Also created at Wyncode Academy, FurEver is a petfinding app built with React and Express JS, which utilizes Petfinder's O-Auth API. FurEver is designed to help match adoptable pets with forever homes in a fun, user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Mission Booked
projects.description: Created while at Wyncode Academy, Mission Booked is a React-Rails app with a PostgreSQL database. It is designed to help people find volunteer opportunities and charitable organizations tailored to their interests.

projects.title: JoJo Quizz
projects.description: For my onboarding project at Mod Op, we built a quizz for a collaboration between Nickelodeon and Walmart using React
